PARAGRAPH.STRING: , the highest peak of the Ruby Mountains and Elko County, is located in the northeast portion of the state of Nevada in the western United States.
rises from a base elevation of about 6000 feet to a height of 11,387 feet (3470 m, the NAVD88 elevation is about 5 feet higher).
is located at 40°37.3'N and 115°28.5'W, about 21 miles southeast of the community of Elko.
